divs: sighting details the ufo mystery i reported on 7\12\12 has been solved. the lighted objects i reported on turned out to be some sort of small hot air balloons launched in memorial of a local high school girl who recently succumbed to leukemia. i had noticed there were a number of the candelaria setting on the baseball diamond across the street from the high school. my deepest sympathies to the family for their tragic loss.
